name: DHCP Callout DLL Installation
description: Detects the installation of a Callout DLL via CalloutDlls and CalloutEnabled parameter in Registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DHCP server (restart required)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.event_data.EventType:Setvalue AND registry.path:(*\\Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\CalloutDlls OR *\\Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\CalloutEnabled))`
